channel.title: Neopets Mystery Pic Script... Payment if works
channel.description:
Hey, can someone make a scar script that uses the mystery pic and searches through the entire neopets image database to find one that matches the color of the mystery pic?
I know this is possible because someone has this script but wont share :(
Paying: 2 USD
